venue.name: Sweet Meadow Farm (playground, pony rides, free circus show, talk and eat)

item.description:
I live in Sherborn and aside from my full time work in marketing field, volunteer to organize all kinds of vendor events, fundraising and for-profit. The next one I organize is coming June 9th at Sweet Meadow Farm, in Sherborn, MA (near Fram/Natick line). Overall I have a little over 3 weeks to organize everything, however i think the event is great and would attract many families with kids from all over the area. We do have a vendor market as a part of this event, so, the opportunity to participate as a vendor certainly exists. For others, it could be just a nice Sunday outdoors at the farm and the ability to relax, meet new people, or may be help us with setup or cleanup? Any help will be appreciated.

Here is the latest flyer, it's not on the website yet https://fbcdn-sphotos-f-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/426582_638700296158422_447370971_n.jpg

here is a link to the website: http://www.sweetmeadowfarm.com/summer-fun-fair-2013.html

here is a link to the vendor's page: http://www.sweetmeadowfarm.com/family-fair-vendors-page.html

I will appreciate all suggestions, comments, and participation, of course!

Thanks,

Sasha

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Sweet Meadow Farm Summer Fun Fair
